short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab management to supercharge your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Conquer tab overload, with a single click.

Overview

Tab Hero is the ultimate Chrome extension for multitasking professionals. If you’re constantly overwhelmed by countless windows and tabs, Tab Hero will save you valuable time! With eight one-click actions to reorganize all your tabs, say goodbye to tab chaos and hello to an organized digital workspace.

Key Features

**8 Powerful, Fully Customizable Buttons**
Setup automations that allow you to Open, Close and Organize your tabs based on combinations of tab URLs and the amount of time that's passed since you last viewed a tab. Customize the behaviour to make yourself the most productive and organized you've ever been.

**Tab Search**
Quickly find that one tab you're looking for among all the open tabs with lighting fast tab search. No more wasting time looking through all your tabs to find the right one while everyone waits.


**Default Buttons That Give You Tab Superpowers**
Use these actions to up your productivity immediately, or customize them to your liking.

1.	Combine Windows
	•	Organizes all open tabs into one window and groups them by URL. 

2.	Work Mode
	•	Organizes all tabs with URLs that match the settings into a new window to let you focus 

3.	Google Suite
	•	Organizes Google Suite product tabs into separate windows
	
4.	Duplicates
	•	Closes tabs with duplicate URLs.
	
5.	Older Than 24h
	•	Closes tabs not accessed in the last 24 hours.
	
6.	Recent
	•	Moves the 5 most recently accessed tabs to a new window.
	
7.	Search Tabs
	•	Closes tabs that originated from a Google search.
	
8.	Social Tabs
	•	Organizes all social media tabs (X, Facebook, Instagram, etc.) into one window.


Why Install Tab Hero?

	•	Boost efficiency by managing your tabs smartly.
	•	Keep your browsing organized and productive.
	•	Customize to fit your unique browsing habits.

Download Tab Hero today and master your tabs for a more efficient digital workspace.
